seo: ThinkPHP,漏洞检测,CNVD-2018-2494,远程命令执行,RCE
summary: 该插件用于检测ThinkPHP5.0.20版本中的远程命令执行漏洞（CNVD-2018-2494），通过发送特定HTTP请求判断是否存在漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the remote command execution vulnerability (CNVD-2018-2494) in ThinkPHP version 5.0.20 by sending a specific HTTP request to determine if the vulnerability exists.
